title: tread93
author: tread93
content: Ello Governor, I am curious to see if there is anything out there that is "in the works" that I am not aware of. I think I am most excited to see Frank's FTX scam coin, but also the limited "Don't get Yogged" card will also be sick! As far as other tokens and such i'm really not sure what other projects that really are interesting are in the works. I am hoping that one day something new is just going to pop up and get lucky enough to get the next super limited piece in time before they sell out! Lol. As an added bonus, if you reply to the top piece, would you also include what your favorite crypto coin is and why? Can't wait to see the posts, if you can also include pictures to make it more fun  (I will add some later)Cheers, TREAD

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: Very excited for the icarus project to hit the community.Any new ballet products are also a nice surprise.Favorites are prefork funded casascius, lealana, and btcc items

comments.author: Mofough82
comments.body: Any links available for the Icarus project?   Trying to learn all I can.

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: Interested in seeing what 1Hodlclub and BTCC release this year, I don't know what if any they have planned,My favorite collectables are not coins, more slabs - BTCC titanium blocks and of course Kialara

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Cardano had just launched its DJED, an algorithmic stablecoin. I think that's one that had been on the news but not getting enough attention. The DJED is a stablecoin that is sort of not centralized as they claimed. DJED is ADA backed. ADA increase in price a bit but not really that notable since most of the altcoins anyway are mooning also.https://cointelegraph.com/news/ada-backed-algorithmic-stablecoin-djed-launched-on-cardano

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on February 01, 2023, 11:48:05 AMQuote from: CoinageMint on February 01, 2023, 12:58:04 AMInterested in seeing what 1Hodlclub and BTCC release this year, I don't know what if any they have planned,My favorite collectables are not coins, more slabs - BTCC titanium blocks and of course KialaraBTCC stopped producing physical crypto items in 2018Thats a shame, just about everything they released was beautiful.I took a crypto break for a few years, so still catching up.I will change BTCC to Cardsmith Currency cards, series 2   (hopefully, series 1 sells out soon and we see series 2)

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: I'd love to see some squirrelbits BARS. Saw a twitter post of a custom bar (only 2 made) and it looked awesome.Something affordable like that for the masses (max 21 lol) - would def make my day.Also would like to see well made new CI silver coins. - It's been a while, right?

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: Quote from: CoinageMint on February 02, 2023, 05:27:51 AMQuote from: minerjones on February 01, 2023, 11:48:05 AMQuote from: CoinageMint on February 01, 2023, 12:58:04 AMInterested in seeing what 1Hodlclub and BTCC release this year, I don't know what if any they have planned,My favorite collectables are not coins, more slabs - BTCC titanium blocks and of course KialaraBTCC stopped producing physical crypto items in 2018Thats a shame, just about everything they released was beautiful.I took a crypto break for a few years, so still catching up.I will change BTCC to Cardsmith Currency cards, series 2   (hopefully, series 1 sells out soon and we see series 2)Welcome back! I am a big fan of the slabs, particularly those Alpen 1,000,000 sats the gold one and the 500,000 silver series but of course the Kialara is classic and the creme de la creme of the bars. Also of course the Cass ones, i've seen the microsoul ones that look in credible. Speaking of rectangular crypto related objects those Cardsmith cards are so fun! I bought a bunch of packs off of MJ when they first came out and had a ball opening them, such beautiful art and holos. Was lucky enough to pull some numbered cards, and I love the chance at hitting a crypto redemption card. I ended up selling a large set of the common cards and just kept all the holos for myself in my card binder. I'll look forward to the series 2 as well. Need to get my hands on some more of series 1 before they sell out!!
